projects.name: Recipe Ready
projects.tagline: Generate recipes from the ingredients in your fridge.
projects.description: AI-powered recipe generation web-application that dynamically creates personalized recipes while providing an intuitive user interface for seamless navigation. This project showcases the fusion of diverse technologies to deliver an interactive culinary experience, combining frontend expertise with backend functionality.

projects.name: Tetris Group Project
projects.description: A Tetris Remake utilizing Java and the Observer Design Pattern. Worked on a team of 5 utilizing the Agile approach.

projects.name: Covid Dashboard
projects.description: Dashboard that acts as a central hub to those looking for a broad global understanding and a specific local understanding of the coronavirus. Uses a choropleth world map for the user to peruse stats relating to geographical location such as: cases, recoveries, and deaths.
